TextLibrary.Text: You have failed to defeat the Wyvern. You must try again.
You have defeated the Wyvern. You must return to Red-Axe in the city of Tusk.
The Trial is complete. Red-Axe is pleased with your progress.
You must travel to the Wyverns' Roost and battle a Wyvern.
You must return to Red-Axe in Tusk for your reward.
This Wyvern is particularly large and has a Battle Skill higher than most.
